original_text: Enemies have destroyed your land. Its towns have become heaps of stones. But soon your land will be too small for all your people to live in. The enemies who destroyed you will be far away from you. Enemies have destroyed your land.
korean_text: 이는 네 황폐하고 적막한 곳들과 네 파멸을 당하였던 땅이 이제는 주민이 많아 좁게 될 것이며 너를 삼켰던 자들이 멀리 떠날 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Its towns have become heaps of stones.
But soon your land will be too small
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이내 당신의 땅은 너무 좁아질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: for all your people to live in.
will be far away from you.
